alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:08PM EDT until June 17 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Northeastern Newberry County in central South Carolina... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 507 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blair, or 12 miles north of VC Summer Nuclear Station, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Winnsboro, Whitmire, Fairfield County Airport, Monticello, Blair, Blackstock, Lebanon Fire Station, Henderson Island, Fairfield County Detention Center, Rion, Winnsboro Mills, Fairfield Elementary School, Maybington Fire Station, Feasterville Fire Station, White Oak and Enoree Ranger District Office. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 42 and 48. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
